page.title: 11"GREGORY'S GIRL" (1)
page.content: We live in Abronhill and go to Abronhill Hill School where the hit film{Gregory's Girl}was filmed. Gregory's Girl is a film based on a boy's school life in Cumbernauld. When it was filmed in 1979 the school was only one year old. The main actors were Dee Hepburn, Gordon Sinclair, and Clair Grogan. Some pupils at the school also got parts in the film. The film is about a 15 year old boy, Gregory, who falls in love with Dorothy who is the only girl in the school football team. She is great at football, or so Gregory thinks! Gregory, who is quite shy, eventually asks Dorothy for a date and they agree to meet at the Town Centre. Dorothy doesn't turn up but she sends her friend to tell him. Gregory is heartbroken until he meets Susan who is played by Clair Grogan in the film.
